sentences.english: April, come she will, when streams are rip and swelled with rain.
sentences.chinese: 四月，春潮带雨袭来之时，她挟一段爱飘然而至。

sentences.english: Clasping her pitcher to her waist mother went to fetch water from the village near by.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把她的水罐挟在腰间，走到近村汲水去了。

sentences.english: There are many clothes in the closet which are bought by my mother.
sentences.chinese: 壁橱里订沪斥疚俪狡筹挟船锚有很多母亲买的衣服。

sentences.english: Pathogenic summer-heat usually accompanies pathogenic dampness to invade the body.
sentences.chinese: 暑邪为病常兼挟湿邪侵袭人体。
